quote: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
author: William James

quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: I really appreciate the fact that none of these people like me
author: Carol Baskin

quote: I'm never going to financially recover from this
author: Joe Exotic

quote: I'm sure you're really funny to certain people
author: Unknown

quote: I didn't expect you to get the job, congrats!
author: Unknown

quote: It's Vodka, it goes bad once it's opened
author: Lindsay Funke

quote: You're so charming when you make an effort
author: Unknown

quote: There's nothing wrong with being single, there's nothing wrong with being alone...
author: Daniel Sloss

quote: You look so much more awake with makeup
author: Unknown
